characteristics.name: Intellect
characteristics.description: The realm of mind, reason, logic, and abstract thought

characteristics.name: Breath
characteristics.description: The vital pneuma, prana, chi - life force moving through all beings

characteristics.name: Communication
characteristics.description: Words, ideas, and messages carried on the wind

characteristics.name: Freedom
characteristics.description: Unbound movement, liberation from earthly constraints

characteristics.name: Invisibility
characteristics.description: Unseen yet everywhere, felt but not grasped

characteristics.name: Change
characteristics.description: Winds of transformation, shifting currents of fate

characteristics.name: Spirit
characteristics.description: The subtle realm between matter and pure consciousness

characteristics.name: Sound
characteristics.description: Voice, music, the vibrations that carry meaning

characteristics.name: Storm
characteristics.description: Destructive power of hurricanes, tornadoes, tempests
